类 SecondPlayerViewV3

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
com.edu.xmum.cst206.View.Entity.V3.SecondPlayerViewV3
所有已实现的接口:
IPlayerView, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class SecondPlayerViewV3 extends javafx.scene.layout.Pane implements IPlayerView
Implementation of the second player view for version 3. This class is responsible for displaying the second player with graphical representations based on the chosen skin and direction.

  • 属性概要
